page.title: 09POLICE H.Q TRAFFIC DEPT.
page.content: 1120 officers, 80 vehicles.8 hour shifts throughout 24 hours.{Patrol {officers' preparation:}make entries in pocket book of messages about stolen vehicles, wanted persons, incidents etc. Equip car with binoculars, alchometer,radio, and tyre tread guage Patrol 3 sections of M6 from Killington to Catterlen, and A66 from Penrith to Durham border.{Training:} must have been in service for over 2 years. Take 4 weeks Advanced Driving Standard Course. Motorcyclists patrol larger areas and do mostly public relations work. Give advice to new owners, run Motor Cyclist of the Year Competition. In control room are 3 officers helped by civilians -control all Traffic Dept police and vehicles & motorway hazard lights & emergency telephones, and have links with department of Transport, RAC and AA.
